entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
